name:

Laval's Journey
formal_name:
LEGO®  Legends of CHIMA:
Laval's Journey
description:
The balance of Chima rests in your hands!

Join Laval the Lion and his allies in an all-new adventure to defend the Land of Chima

Unleash the power of CHI

Battle fierce enemies

Play with over 60 characters
